verses.name: Luke 24:6
verses.text: He is not here, but is risen: remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee,

verses.name: Luke 24:7
verses.text: Saying, The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again.

verses.name: Luke 24:9
verses.text: And returned from the sepulchre, and told all these things unto the eleven, and to all the rest.

verses.name: Luke 24:10
verses.text: It was Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary the mother of James, and other women that were with them, which told these things unto the apostles.
